text: mariyu ma spastamaina sucanalu variki vinipincabadinappudu, satyatiraskarula mukhala mida tiraskaranni nivu gamanistavu. Inka varu ma sucanalanu vinipince varipai dadapu virucuku padaboye varu. Varito anu: "Emi? Nenu dini kante ghoramaina visayanni gurinci miku telupana? Adi narakagni! Allah danini satyatiraskarulaku vagdanam cesi unnadu. Mariyu adi enta adhvannamaina gamyasthanam
